effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 680,509 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 281,622.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.
Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 680,509 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 281,622.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.
Set: Holy Shock's healing is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set: Holy Shock increases the initial healing of your next Word of Glory or Light of Dawn by 8%, stacking up to 4 times.

Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 680,509 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 281,622.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 8,355 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 2,492 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
